content: Yuncong HuSearchYuncong Hu(胡云聪)Assistant ProfessorShanghai Jiao Tong UniversityAboutHi! I am an assistant professor at Shanghai Jiao Tong University. My recent research interests are applied cryptography, decentralized systems, and zero-knowledge proofs.I received my CS Ph.D. at UC Berkeley RISE Lab, where I was co-advised by Raluca Ada Popa and Alessandro Chiesa.I received my Bachelor's degree at Shanghai Jiao Tong University in 2017, where I was a member of the ACM Honored Class.I am a co-author of arkworks, an ecosystem for developing and
